english: I suffer a malady that no balm can cure !
chinese: 可叹的是我的病痛却找不到香膏来治愈。
这剂药减轻了他的病痛。

english: His face was coarse-slack from illness, suffering, and absurdity .
chinese: 他脸上的肌肉粗糙松弛，是病痛、苦难和荒唐生活造成的结果。

english: They have to cope with arthritis and the other physical difficulties of aging .
chinese: 他们必须要对付关节炎和由于衰老而引起的其他病痛。
病痛造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Physical and mental afflictions are now known by less forthright names than twenty of thirty years ago .
chinese: 对于肉体上和精神上受到的病痛折磨现在不象二十年前或三十年前那样直言不讳了。

english: I was lying between sleep and waking, my eyes wide open in the darkness, the sickness quite departed .
chinese: 我正迷迷糊糊，似醒非醒地躺着，我在黑暗中睁大着眼睛，那时候，病痛已经消失大半。

english: The sickness quite departed, but succeeded by a horrid giddiness and swimming that was almost worse to bear .
chinese: 病痛已经消失大半，可是接踵而来的却是一阵更加难以忍受的可怕的眼花、头晕。

english: There came to me that dreadful sense of illness, which we have no name for either in scots or english .
chinese: 我遭受到的这种病痛的可怕的感觉，在苏格兰话或英文中，还没有适当的字眼可以拿来形容。

english: His father was gentler, older than he had ever seen him, his pain had returned on him. he was absent and sorrowful .
chinese: 他父亲比以前慈祥，也比以前显得老。老人家的病痛又发作了，常常心不在焉，愁眉苦脸。

english: I had left this woman in bitterness and hate, and i came back to her now with no other emotion than a sort of ruth for her great sufferings .
chinese: 我在痛苦和憎恨中离开这个女人，现在我回来时的心情，却只是同情她的极大病痛。

english: Master , why do we have physical ailments
chinese: 亲爱的师父，为何我们会有身体的病痛？

english: Dr . chase : gambling doesn ' t take away ( house ' s ) pain
chinese: 赌博并不能消除你的病痛。

english: These vitamin b and c are to build up your resistance
chinese: 这些药片可以解除病痛。

english: Should doctors help sick infants to die
chinese: 医生是否能帮助病痛中的婴儿结束他们生命？
